Package digital.ivan.lightchain.core.router

Interface IRouterConfig

All Known Implementing Classes:
RouterConfig
public interface IRouterConfig
Represents the contract for router configurations. This interface provides methods for mapping routes to their respective tools, retrieving tool descriptions, and listing available tools.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getDescription()
    Retrieves a description of the router configuration.
    String
    getStringToolsList()
    Retrieves a string representation of the list of available tools.
    List<IRouterToolCall>
    getToolsList()
    Retrieves the list of all available tool calls.
    IRouterToolCall
    mapRoute(String name)
    Maps a given route name to its corresponding tool call.

  • Method Details

    • mapRoute

      IRouterToolCall mapRoute(String name)
      Maps a given route name to its corresponding tool call.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the route to be mapped.
      Returns:
      The IRouterToolCall instance associated with the given route name.

    • getDescription

      String getDescription()
      Retrieves a description of the router configuration.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the router's description.

    • getStringToolsList

      String getStringToolsList()
      Retrieves a string representation of the list of available tools.
      Returns:
      A string listing all the available tools.

    • getToolsList

      List<IRouterToolCall> getToolsList()
      Retrieves the list of all available tool calls.
      Returns:
      A list of IRouterToolCall instances representing all available tools.
